original_text: The master agreed with the workers that he would pay them one silver coin for a day's work. Then he sent them to work in the field.
korean_text: 그가 하루 한 데나리온씩 품꾼들과 약속하여 포도원에 들여보내고

sentences.original_text: The master agreed with the workers
that he would pay them one silver coin
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 은화 한 닢을 지불할 것이라고

sentences.original_text: Then he sent them to work
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 그들을 보내어 일하게 했습니다
